QuestData.Title: WANTED: Dark Chronicler
QuestData.Description: Champion wanted for an expedition into the depths of Xibala. $b$bStrange noises and wails come from the bones at night and our workers are terrified. $b$bSeek out the source of the strange noises and destroy it, and a reward will be yours.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The last remnant of the worshippers of Xibala.
